attributes.action: Have police control the use of E-Scooters in public areas.
attributes.additional_details: My grandmother was knocked down and hurt by someone riding an e-scooter on the footpath.
attributes.background: Make the use of E-Scooters in public areas illegal and have police do more to protect the public from them being used on footpaths and roads.

rejection.details:
It is already illegal to ride e-scooters on a public footpath.

You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban all electric scooters on public roads 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745477
